verses.verse: And when He had come <S%G1525><s%> back <S%G3825><s%> to Capernaum <S%G2746><s%> several days <S%G2250><s%> afterward, <S%G1223><s%> it was heard <S%G191><s%> that He was at home. <S%G3624><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that there was no <S%G3371><s%> longer <S%G3371><s%> room, <S%G5562><s%> even <S%G3366><s%> near <S%G4314><s%> the door; <S%G2374><s%> and He was speaking <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to them.
And they came, <S%G2064><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> to Him a paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> carried <S%G142><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> men. <S%G5064><s%>

And being unable <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> to get <S%G4374><s%> to Him because <S%G1223><s%> of the crowd, <S%G3793><s%> they removed <S%G648><s%> the roof <S%G4721><s%> above <S%G3699><s%> Him; and when they had dug <S%G1846><s%> an opening, they let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> the pallet <S%G2895><s%> on which <S%G3699><s%> the paralytic <S%G3885><s%> was lying. <S%G2621><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G3708><s%> their faith <S%G4102><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> "My son, <S%G5043><s%> your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven. <S%G863><s%>"
But there were some <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> and reasoning <S%G1260><s%> in their hearts, <S%G2588><s%>

"Why <S%G5101><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> that way <S%G3779><s%>? He is blaspheming; <S%G987><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> alone <S%G1520><s%>?"

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> aware <S%G1921><s%> in His spirit <S%G4151><s%> that they were reasoning <S%G1260><s%> that way <S%G3779><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you reasoning <S%G1260><s%> about these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> in your hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

"Which <S%G5101><s%> is easier, <S%G2123><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to the paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> 'Your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven <S%G863><s%>'; or <S%G2228><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Arise, <S%G1453><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up your pallet <S%G2895><s%> and walk <S%G4043><s%>'?

"But in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may know <S%G3609><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>" – He said <S%G3004><s%> to the paralytic <S%G3885><s%> –
"I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, rise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142><s%> up your pallet <S%G2895><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> home. <S%G3624><s%>"

And he rose <S%G1453><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> took <S%G142><s%> up the pallet <S%G2895><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out in the sight <S%G1715><s%> of all; <S%G3956><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G1839><s%> and were glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "We have never <S%G3763><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> anything like <S%G3779><s%> this. <S%G3779><s%>"

And He went <S%G1831><s%> out again <S%G3825><s%> by the seashore; <S%G2281><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> were coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him, and He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> them.

And as He passed <S%G3855><s%> by, He saw <S%G3708><s%> Levi <S%G3017><s%> the [son] of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the tax <S%G5058><s%> office, <S%G5058><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Follow <S%G190><s%> Me!" And he rose <S%G450><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> Him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that He was reclining <S%G2621><s%> [at the table] in his house, <S%G3614><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> tax-gatherers and sinners <S%G268><s%> were dining <S%G4873><s%> with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and His disciples; <S%G3101><s%> for there were many <S%G4183><s%> of them, and they were following <S%G190><s%> Him.

And when the scribes <S%G1122><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that He was eating <S%G2068><s%> with the sinners <S%G268><s%> and tax-gatherers, they [began] saying <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> is He eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking <S%G4095><s%> with tax-gatherers and sinners <S%G268><s%>?"

And hearing <S%G191><s%> this, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "[It is] not those <S%G3588><s%> who are healthy <S%G2480><s%> who need <S%G5532><s%> a physician, <S%G2395><s%> but those <S%G3588><s%> who are sick; <S%G2560><s%> I did not come <S%G2064><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but sinners. <S%G268><s%>"

And John's disciples <S%G3101><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were fasting; <S%G3522><s%> and they came <S%G2064><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do John's disciples <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> but Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> do not fast <S%G3522><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "While <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is with them, the attendants <S%G5207><s%> of the bridegroom <S%G3567><s%> do not fast, <S%G3522><s%> do they? So <S%G3745><s%> long <S%G5550><s%> as they have <S%G2192><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> with them, they cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> fast. <S%G3522><s%>

"But the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is taken <S%G522><s%> away <S%G522><s%> from them, and then <S%G5119><s%> they will fast <S%G3522><s%> in that day. <S%G2250><s%>

" No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> sews <S%G1976><s%> a patch <S%G1915><s%> of unshrunk <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on an old <S%G3820><s%> garment; <S%G2440><s%> otherwise <S%G7507><s%> the patch <S%G4138><s%> pulls <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from it, the new <S%G2537><s%> from the old, <S%G3820><s%> and a worse <S%G5501><s%> tear <S%G4978><s%> results. <S%G1096><s%>

"And no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into old <S%G3820><s%> wineskins; <S%G779><s%> otherwise <S%G7507><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> will burst <S%G4486><s%> the skins, <S%G779><s%> and the wine <S%G3631><s%> is lost, <S%G622><s%> and the skins <S%G779><s%> [as well;] but [one puts] new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into fresh <S%G2537><s%> wineskins. <S%G779><s%>"

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that He was passing <S%G3899><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grainfields <S%G4702><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> their way <S%G3598><s%> along while picking <S%G5089><s%> the heads <S%G4719><s%> [of grain.]

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "See <S%G2396><s%> here, <S%G2396><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> are they doing <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%>?"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Have you never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G7035><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was in need <S%G5532><s%> and became hungry, <S%G3983><s%> he and his companions <S%G3588><s%>: <S%G3326><s%>

how <S%G4459><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the time <S%G1909><s%> of Abiathar [the] high <S%G8><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and ate <S%G749><s%> the consecrated <S%G2068><s%> bread, <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G740><s%> is not lawful <S%G3739><s%> for [anyone] to eat <S%G1832><s%> except <S%G2068><s%> the priests, <S%G1508><s%> and he gave <S%G2409><s%> [it] also <S%G1325><s%> to those <S%G2532><s%> who were with him? "
And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "The Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> for man, <S%G444><s%> and not man <S%G444><s%> for the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>
"Consequently, <S%G5620><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is Lord <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of the Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>"
